<!-- source-hash: e967f1245ea1ec447d6abcb6408a55b1 -->
A Spring mapper component that converts between internal tool domain objects and external API DTOs for the OpenFrame platform's tool management system.

## Key Components

- **`toToolResponse()`** - Maps `IntegratedTool` entities to `ToolResponse` DTOs with complete tool information including URLs, credentials, and metadata
- **`toToolsResponse()`** - Converts `ToolList` collections to paginated `ToolsResponse` DTOs
- **`toToolFilterResponse()`** - Maps `ToolFilters` to `ToolFilterResponse` DTOs for filtering options
- **`toToolFilterOptions()`** - Converts external `ToolFilterCriteria` to internal `ToolFilterOptions`
- **`toSortInput()`** - Maps external `SortCriteria` to internal `SortInput` with direction conversion
- **Private helper methods** - Handle nested object mapping for URLs, credentials, and API keys

## Usage Example

```java
@RestController
public class ToolController {
    
    @Autowired
    private ToolMapper toolMapper;
    
    @GetMapping("/tools/{id}")
    public ToolResponse getTool(@PathVariable String id) {
        IntegratedTool tool = toolService.findById(id);
        return toolMapper.toToolResponse(tool);
    }
    
    @GetMapping("/tools")
    public ToolsResponse getTools(
        @RequestParam ToolFilterCriteria criteria,
        @RequestParam SortCriteria sort
    ) {
        ToolFilterOptions filterOptions = toolMapper.toToolFilterOptions(criteria);
        SortInput sortInput = toolMapper.toSortInput(sort);
        
        ToolList tools = toolService.findTools(filterOptions, sortInput);
        return toolMapper.toToolsResponse(tools);
    }
}
```

The mapper provides null-safe conversions and handles enum-to-string transformations for API compatibility while maintaining clean separation between internal domain models and external API contracts.
